pages.title: Master Axis
pages.text: The <item>Master Axis/$ is a core part of any <thing>rotary/$ network. Without one, gears, axles, and the like will not spin or transfer energy between each other.$(br2)Each network only needs one <item>master axis/$. Simple attach any gear or axle to the front face of the <item>master axis/$.$(br2)The <item>master axis/$ doesn't have any <thing>I

<thing>value/$ or anything else like that- in early game it just exists to make everything work.$(br2)Later game, there are some <item>$(l:essentials:beam/crystal_axis)special master axes/$ with useful effects.$(br2)
